mapper.select: SELECT order_menu_id as orderMenuId, order_id as orderId, menu_id as menuId, menu_name as menuName, menu_price as menuPrice, quantity, total_price as totalPrice, is_deleted as isDeleted, deleted_at as deletedAt FROM ordermenu WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY order_menu_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordermenu ( order_id, menu_id, menu_name, menu_price, quantity, total_price, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{menuId}, #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice}, #{isDeleted} )
